Text: Also, this may take a while to seed. My up speed is only 50 KB/s.

Is 1080p really necessary? If you have the time and space to get it, I guess this is great. I'm okay with the 720p sets though. I really don't think traditional animation needs to be 1080. Only CGI and stuff, but that's my opinion. I was going to get this, but it was going to take too long.

Yeah, I agree with PkmnMstr. It's a great torrent and all, and I would definitely download and seed, but it takes up way too much space. 

If there was any way you could upload it in 720p that would be awesome! But if not, I understand. 

Regardless, thanks for the upload. :)

Well, it took me nearly a month to get this fully seeded. Now maybe someone with better bandwidth than I can keep it up. :D
Yet another correction, the audio is only standard AC3 5.1 @ 448Kbps. Apparently MakeMKV doesn't do TrueHD, and I've yet to find a BluRay->MKV converter that will make 5.1 FLAC MKVs.
